ComicInfo.Summary: While Deadpool was tracking down the mob bosses, his employer's wife was shot and killed. Now, Deadpool's informant gets a little closer to him. Close enough to see his face. But when ever things start going good for Deadpool something always messes it up.
ComicInfo.Title: Cruel Summer Part Two
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
